20110118131817.000|20110118131819.000|CC1|YOU COULD NOT EXPECT THIS

20110118131834.000|20110118131838.000|CC1|GROWTH PACKET, WE NEED TO TALK  
20110118131838.000|20110118131843.000|CC1|ABOUT POSSIBLY -- BUT THIS NEEDS
20110118131843.000|20110118131852.000|CC1|TO BE DISCUSSED.                
20110118131852.000|20110118131853.000|CC1|WE NEED TO TALK ABOUT WHAT

20110118131856.000|20110118131857.000|CC1|THAT'S PRETTY CLEAR.
